name: The Map
mission: Extract hawkish/dovish tone, forward pressure, rate path, and macro wind direction.
drivers: Low oil price ($60.14) pressuring government revenue and energy sector profits.
High US 10Y yields (4.14%) and a strong DXY (98.99) increasing capital outflow risks.
Extreme global risk-aversion, indicated by a very high gold price ($4197.60), overshadowing US equity strength.
ai_analysis: The Saudi market faces substantial pressure from the low oil price, its primary economic engine. This is compounded by tighter global financial conditions and significant risk-off sentiment, which are likely to drive capital away from emerging markets despite a strong S&P 500.
